participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is hardworking and dedicated, with a deep connection to nature through his bee farming. He has a humorous side, often making light of his unique life circumstances.
participant_1.background: i'm a bee farmer. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i am close to.
